definitions.definition: Alert and paying close attention ; watchful .
examples: The observant police officer noticed that my tax disk was out-of-date.

definitions.definition: Diligently attentive in observing a law , custom , duty or principle ; regardful ; mindful .
examples: I was normally observant of the local parking restrictions.

main_definition: Alert and paying close attention ; watchful .
secondary_definitions: Diligently attentive in observing a law , custom , duty or principle ; regardful ; mindful .
